content: **knitted baby socks with cables sizes premature - 3/4 years piece is worked in drops babymerino ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern no bm-077-by yarn group a ---------------------------------------------------------- sizes premature 1/3 - 6/9 - 12/18 months 2 - 3/4 years size equivalent to approx child s length in cm 40/44 - 56/62 - 68/74 - 80/86 92 - 98/104 fits foot length 8 10-11-12 14-16 cm materials drops babymerino from garnstudio belongs to yarn group a 50 50-50-50 50-50 g colour 11 ice blue the piece can also be knitted with yarn from alternative yarn yarn group a see link below drops double pointed needles size 2 5 mm for the rib or the size needed to get 26 stitches and 34 row stocking stitch on 10 cm in width and 10 cm in height drops cable needle for cables ----------------------------------------------------------
